name: DownhillVR
description:
Introducing DownhillVR

DownhillVR is the ultimate virtual reality mountain biking video game that brings the thrill of extreme downhill racing right to your living room. Experience the rush of speeding down challenging tracks and catching air off jaw-dropping jumps, all while immersing yourself in stunning environments.


With intuitive controls and a variety of gameplay modes, DownhillVR is perfect for both experienced gamers and those new to virtual reality. Get ready to experience the thrill of extreme downhill racing like never before.

Features

  • Experience a variety of game modes like free ride, time trial, or race against NPCs in single-player mode.
  • Explore stunning virtual reality environments and handcrafted tracks, including gnarly downhill runs and technical cross-country trails. Race under different conditions like day, sunset, or at night with headlamps on.
  • Test your skills with a variety of challenges that will push your mountain biking abilities to the limit. Can you conquer them all?
  • Enjoy endless hours of fun with your friends at home with hot seat mode, even if you only have one VR headset. Take turns competing against each other's avatars for hours of entertainment

Virtual Reality Downhill Racing

Downhill mountain biking is a thrilling and high-stakes sport that requires skill, speed, and bravery. In DownhillVR, you'll get to experience all the excitement of downhill racing in the comfort of your own home. With immersive virtual reality gameplay and challenging tracks, you'll feel like you're really soaring down the mountain. Whether you're competing against the clock or other players, you'll be on the edge of your seat as you navigate tight turns and fly-over jumps.


Get ready to experience the thrill of downhill racing in DownhillVR!

Amazing environments and handcrafted tracks

Race through a variety of breathtaking environments, each with its own unique challenges and features. Our tracks are all handcrafted to provide a seamless and realistic experience, so you'll feel like you're really flying through the terrain. From dense forests to rocky mountainsides, there's something for every kind of rider. Each environment has its own look and feel, and our tracks are designed to push the limits of what's possible in virtual reality. Whether you're tackling a technical cross-country trail or flying down a steep downhill run, you'll feel fully immersed in the action.

Customize your look

Create a personalized experience by customizing the appearance of your bike and rider. Choose from a variety of options for your rider's clothing and gear to create a look that fits your style, and customize your bike to stand out from the rest.


Whether you prefer a minimalist or flashy look, our game offers a range of customization options for your bike and rider. Tweak everything from the bike's color scheme to the rider's clothing and protective gear to make it truly your own.

Be prepared to ride!

Get ready to hit the trails and experience the thrill of mountain biking like never before with DownhillVR. Our action-packed virtual reality game brings the excitement of downhill mountain biking right to your headset.


DownhillVR Early Access is coming soon to Steam, and you can add it to your wishlist now to be notified when it becomes available. Don't miss out on this immersive and exhilarating VR experience.
